name: NeMEsis (itch) (FireLizard2001, DWMcDonald, yoonyung)
description:
A submission to the first Tri Annual Game Jam.
Theme: You are your own enemy

A quest to save the timestream.
In the village, you may choose one of three items to aid you on your quest. 
1) A clock to slow down time
2) Meat to distract wild animals 
3) Iron gauntlets to punch harder

WASD or Arrow Keys to Move
E to Attack/Interact
